page.title: 20INDUSTRY
page.content: There is no heavy industry in the area at all, the main industry being farming. However there are several small firms that employ people from the locality. The Mill at Buxton employs one or two people as does the hotel attached to it. In Lammas there is a pet food wholesalers which employs about a dozen people. The largest place of employment by far is R.A.F. Coltishall which employs a large number of civilians from the area. CREDITS. {Information supplied by: } Class 4 Buxton C.P. School Donald Peter MacKenzie {Photographs by:} Donald MacKenzie John Capocci R.A.F. Coltishall
